user_instruction: 'Send my manager Mr. Thompson (thompson@wanderlustadventures.com) an email with a summary of my recent client interactions. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
To: John [john@wanderlustadventures.com]  
Subject: Request for Summary of Recent Client Interactions

Hi John,

When you have a moment, could you please prepare and email me a concise summary of your recent client interactions? Feel free to use any notes, messages, or records from your Gmail and our Notion workspace to compile the information.

Having this overview will help us pinpoint areas where we can refine our services and better anticipate client needs.

Thank you in advance for pulling this together.

Best regards,  
Mr. Thompson  
Head of Wanderlust Adventures

final_output:
